mapper.select: SELECT ID AS id, EMAIL AS email, '*********' AS PASSWORD, NAME AS name, NICKNAME AS nickname, DATE_FORMAT(BIRTH_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS birthDate, GENDER AS gender, TEL AS tel, ZIP_CODE AS zipCode, ADDRESS AS address, ADDRESS_DETAIL AS addressDetail FROM USERS WHERE IDX = #{userIdx}
mapper.update: UPDATE USERS SET NAME = #{dto.name}, NICKNAME = #{dto.nickname}, BIRTH_DATE = STR_TO_DATE(#{dto.birthDate}, '%Y-%m-%d'), GENDER = #{dto.gender}, TEL = #{dto.tel}, ZIP_CODE = #{dto.zipCode}, ADDRESS = #{dto.address}, ADDRESS_DETAIL = #{dto.addressDetail}, UPDATED_AT = NOW() WHERE IDX = #{userIdx}
